creator: nmische@gmail.com
text: Not sure if this is a bug, but it appears XSSFRow.getLastCellNum() returns the index of the last cell while HSSFRow.getLastCellNum() returns the index of the last cell plus one.

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
This bug is fixed in 3.5-beta3 and in trunk. 
Daily builds are avaiable at 
  http://encore.torchbox.com/poi-svn-build/OOXML-Branch/

Yegor
